frame.name: Preliminaries
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame describes means actions (<fen>Preparatory_act</fen>s) that are taken by an <fen>Agent</fen> for the purpose of preparing for a later act.
Contrast this frame with a scenario involving earlier versions of some entity being superseded by later versions (e.g., <ment>preliminary results, advance copy</ment>).
<ex><fex name="Preparatory_act">This update</fex> <m>lays</m> the <t>groundwork</t> <fex name="Purpose">for future improvements</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Preparatory_act
FE.definition:
<def-root>The action performed by the Agent that is a preliminary to the achievement of the <fen>Purpose</fen>. The <fen>Preparatory_act</fen> may also be expressed by a result of such an act.
<ex><fex name="pre">The company's actions at that stage</fex> <m>were</m> simply <t>preliminary</t> to the takeover.</ex> <ex>Nothing remarkable could be found, as it was almost certainly a <t>preliminary</t> <fex name="pre">book</fex> to the final publication of results.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>The ultimate goal or purpose of the <fen>Agent</fen>, which the Preparatory_act enables.</def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>A characteristic of the <fen>Preparatory_act</fen>, <fen>Agent</fen>, or other participant.</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>The extent to which the <fen>Preparatory_act</fen> is distant from the achievement of the <fen>Purpose</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Domain_of_relevance
FE.definition:
<def-root>The area, field, or domain for which the preliminary action is relevant.
<ex>This laid the <fex name="dom">political</fex> <t>groundwork</t> for his victory in May.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time at which the <fen>Preparatory_act</fen> takes place.</def-root>

FE.name: Preparatory_phase
FE.definition:
<def-root>The part of the larger process that is preliminary to the achievement of the <fen>Purpose</fen>.
<ex>We are still in the <t>preliminary</t> <fex name="pre_pha">phases</fex>.</ex></def-root>
